GSD.description:
rtl818x: Prevent using not initialized queues

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.46 by commit 6ad81ad0cf5744738ce94c8e64051ddd80a1734c. For more details please see the references link.
